attributes.action: STAND WITH THE FARMERS IN INDIA AND PUNJAB!
attributes.background: TELL THE PRIME MINISTER OF INDIA TO TAKE BACK THESE NEW BILLS AS THEY DESTROY THE LIVELIHOODS OF FARMERS! FARMERS LIVE ON FARMING! HAVING THAT TAKEN AWAY KILLS THEM INSIDE! USE THE HASHTAG #istandwithfarmers ON SEVERAL SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORMS TO RAISE AWARENESS!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

Agricultural reform in India is a matter for the Indian Government and Parliament, not the UK Parliament.
